IORecursiveLockLock FunctionIORecursiveLockLockDriverKitiOSiPadOSmacOSvoid IORecursiveLockLock(struct IORecursiveLock * lock); Parameters lockPointer to the allocated lock.

Lock a recursive lock.

Lock the recursive lock. If the lock is held by another thread, block waiting for its unlock. The lock may be taken recursively by the same thread, with a balanced number of calls to IORecursiveLockUnlock.

# IORecursiveLockLock | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ DriverKit ](/documentation/driverkit)

- [ IORecursiveLockLock ](/documentation/driverkit/iorecursivelocklock)

-  IORecursiveLockLock 

Function# IORecursiveLockLock

DriverKitiOSiPadOSmacOS

```
void IORecursiveLockLock(struct IORecursiveLock * lock);
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/driverkit/iorecursivelocklock#parameters)

`lock`Pointer to the allocated lock.

## [Discussion](/documentation/driverkit/iorecursivelocklock#discussion)

Lock a recursive lock.

Lock the recursive lock. If the lock is held by another thread, block waiting for its unlock. The lock may be taken recursively by the same thread, with a balanced number of calls to IORecursiveLockUnlock.
